text:
Kali kedua nginap di golden tulip, 
Yg pertama cuma sebentar mnt late check in bisa, masuk kamar jam 4 subuh dilayani dengan ramah, krna cuma sebentar review nya ga bisa 🤭🤭

Yang kedua 3 mlm nginap, dan pelayanan nya sangat, sangat memuaskan..
Hari pertama urusan pekerjaan krna kmi ada diklat di golden..
Meeting room bersih, fasilitas lengkap, snack nya jga enak2..

Sisanya staycation.. dan pelayanan nya luar biasa, pegawai nya ramah2, satpam luar biasa fast respon ( 2 thumbs up, semacam satpam BCA juga lah ) semoga sehat dan lancar rezeki bapa2 satpam semua 🤗🤗

Pokoknya pegawai2nya mantap lah, yg direceptionist temen sya ga bawa kunci krna dibawa suaminya semua, diantrkan sama pegawai nya smpe ke kamar,
Satpam sigap buat komando mobil parkir, dan langsung lari buat buka pintu
Pegawai resto nya okee punyaaa, ramah dan saat anak berenang mnt tolong kopi, langsung garcep donk..
Fasilitas lengkap ky pelampung dll, ga ribet ky di hotel lain, yg urusan handuk aja susah.. 🤭🤭
 
Cuma kebetulan sabtu minggu ada acara kawinan jd area kolam renang pas pagi ga bisa dipake, tp pegawai informatif sekali menjelaskan klo kolam sore udh bisa dipake lagi 👏👏

Pokoknyq best lah golden tulip ini, lain kali saya milih nginap disini aja 👍👍
Sukses terus..
title: Terbaiiik !!

text: Sebelumnya hotel ini sangat baik dan bersih, tapi terakhir kunjungan saya di hotel ini malah mendapati handuk yang sudah lusuh,dan sprei yang ada noda, entah karna kotor atau karna terlalu sering digunakan. Tolong pihak hotel supaya kondisikan kelayakan barang yang di gunakan.
title: Peralatan kurang bersih

text:
Check in ke hotel ini untuk liburan bersama orang tua dari Jakarta. Saya membooking hotel by phone dan mendapatkan harga yang cukup terjangkau selama 2 malam. Lokasinya sangat strategis, kalau mau ke mall tinggal menyebrang dan cukup banyak pilihan makanan kiri kanan hotel.
Kamar yang kami dapat cukup luas dan bagus banget. Terdapat 2 jubah mandi (baju handuk), channel TV lumayan lengkap, pemadangannya ke kota dan terlihat kolam renang juga. 

Kami sempat membeli oleh-oleh yang harus disimpan di freezer, kami meminta tolong ke layanan kamar untuk dititipkan, mereka pun menyanggupi bahkan saat kami chek-out pun, mereka sudah menyiapkannya kembali tanpa kami minta.

Sarapannya lengkap sampai ada soto banjar juga, enak enaaaaak banget. Restoran langsung menyambung ke kolam renang. Banyak pilihan sarapannya. Selama menginap, kami sempat pergi sangat pagi setelah subuh, karena tidak sempat sarapan, kami meminta untuk dibungkuskan, hotel-pun menyanggupi dengan 2 kotak nasi goreng yang enak banget rasanya.

Sangat recomended banget !

text:
Saya menginap untuk 1 malam disini bersama rekan kerja.
Kami memilih Hotel ini karena letaknya ditengah kota dan dekat dengan tempat yg akan kami tuju.
Lokasinya cukup strategis, terletak di seberang satu2nya Mal di Kota Banjarmasin (Duta Mall). 
Terdapat ATM center di halaman hotel & Bank BCA di sebelah hotel.
Halaman parkir cukup luas. Arsitektur luar hotel terlihat menarik dari kejauhan.
Lobi hotel cukup luas & terdapat beberapa meja & sofa untuk tamu.
Proses check-in berjalan lancar & cepat.
Kamar yg kami tempati terletak diujung lantai dgn view langsung menghadap ke Duta Mall.
Ukuran kamar cukup luas dgn dua buah kasur yg nyaman. Hanya saja teman saya mengeluhkan bahwa di kasurnya ditemukan seperti ada binatang kecil2.
Ada timbangan badan, bathrobe towel & digital clock with alarm di kamar, namun sayangnya tidak disediakan sandal kamar.
Saat kami minta ke pihak room service, mereka mengatakan sedang kehabisan sandal hotel. Namun mereka mengusahakan sandal jepit swallow sebagai gantinya.
Kamar mandi juga OK, air panas berfungsi dgn normal & perlengkapan standar disediakan.
Ada restoran franchise Duck King di lt.2.
Ada kolam renang, spa & ruang fitnes yg sayangnya tidak sempat kami lihat & gunakan.
Sedikit kekurangnyamanan adalah tombol touch screen di lift hotel yg agak kurang baik responnya.

text: Saya menginap di hotel ini beserta rombongan dan memesan kamar dengan jumlah yang cukup banyak. Kamar yang sempit membuat sayan tidak nyaman, belum kamar mandi yang bentuknyan masih lebih bagus hotel bintang 3, padahal hotel ini mengklaim bintang 4. Kekecawaan saya bertambah ketika keesokan harinya hingga jam 4 sore kamar belum dibersihkan, ketika saya menelepon resepsionis, responya sangat lambat. Berbicara internet gratis, saya sama sekali tidak dapat memanfaatkan selama berada di kamar. Wofi bagus hanya ada di tempat umum, seperti restoran dan kolam renang. Perhatian jika anda menginap di hotel ini, pastikan kunci yang anda terima benar Jumlahnya, karena satu kunci yang hilang seharga 100.000. Dan meski merasa tidak menghilangkan bisa tetap dipaksa bayar. Selain itu, fasilitas hotel tidak seperti hotel bintang 4 lainnya. Untuk sandal saja sampai tidak tersedia di kamar, meskipun sudah minta sejak hari pertama, hingga hari keempat tetap tidak disediakan sandal. Dan ternyata hal ini menimpa beberapa rombongan saya.
title: HOTEL YANG SANGAT MENGECEWAKAN

text:
Saya senang menginap disini, pelayanan house-keeping nya bagus, ramah, cepat tanggap. Tapi entah kenapa di bagian Branch Restaurant sangat buruk.
Pada hari ini : sabtu, 28 november 2015
Kami breakfast di restaurant, dan mendapat perlakuan sangat buruk dari (entah) manager restaurant atau siapalah itu yg bertugas mendata custumer yg mau makan.
Seperti underestimate sama customer. Memang sih kami tidak mengenakan pakaian mahal, tidak punya tampang org berduit. Tapi setidaknya jangan meremehkan kami. Kan kami disini bayar !!

Ketika kami makan, kami diperhatikan seperti dicurigai mencuri sesuatu.
Karena kami bayar dan bisa makan sepuasnya ya hak kami dong ngambil makanan.
Waktu saya pesan sosis, saya tanya bisa dibungkus bawa kekamar atau ga. Si embak2 jawab : bisa.

Tapi beberpa menit kemudian si manager restaurant ini menghampiri meja kami dan bilang kalau tidak boleh dibungkus.
Oke lalu saya bilang makan direstaurant saja.
Dan beberapa lama kami menunggu pesanan tapi tidak kunjung datang juga. Dan si manager restaurant ini mondar mandir memperhatikan meja kami seolah kami orang yg pantas dicurigai.

Saya cukup bersabar. Dan karena terlalu lama menunggu pesanan yg tidak juga diantar, saya pergi keluar. Duduk di dekat kolam renang bersama teman. Si manager keluar mendekati kolam renang lalu melihat ke arah meja kami seperti sedang mengintip. Tidak ada sopan santun nya. Kan sudah ada cctv, apa masih perlu mengintai?
Jelek sekali etika nya. Kami merasa tidak dihargai. Lalu kami check out segera.

Mungkin kami memang tidak seperti orang kaya, tapi jangan remehkan kami. Kami bayar disini!!!!!

Lain kali, jangan di ulangi. Jangan sampai ada orang lain yg merasa seperti kami.

Atau kala perku pecat saja staff yg tidak punya etika seperti itu.
Dihotel lain saja tidak pernah saya diperlakukan seperti ini. Seolah kami di black list lalu di mata2i.

Sekian kritik dari saya.
Saya lupa siapa nama si manager itu, yg pasti tadi pagi ada di restaurant.

Salam.
Faula Anjuany
Dari kamar 0935 atas nama Winda Maria Issani.
title: Pelayanan Branch Restoran

text: Hotel ini terletak ditengah kota dan bersebarangan dengan Duta Mall. Hotel ini sangat nyaman dan menyenangkan. Saat masuk anda akan dimanjakan dengan suara gemericik air dari air mancur/kolam yang ada ditengah lobby hotel. Di Lobby juga tersedia bar, lounge dan cake shop dengan pilihan kue yang menarik dan terlihat yummy sekali. Pelayanannya sangat ramah namun agak lambat untuk bagian concierge, untuk membawa barang dari kamar ke lobby saja perlu waktu yang sangat lama, entah kurang trolly atau kekurangan pegawai. Untuk breakfast di hotel ini sangat banyak variasi pilihan makannanya dan rasanya enak 4/5. Terima kasih untuk Mr. Chef yang mau meminjamkan chillernya untuk saya menyimpan bahan makanan saya. Soto banjar dan Nasi kuningnya cukup enak, western section dan dessert sectionnya juga very awesome! Untuk Mr. Dana dibagian service saat breakfast sangat helpful dan ramah banget, dia juga sangat cepat dan tanggap jika saya minta bantun lebih dari staff lain, very dedicated employe! Just poor managment if not giving him award!  Disamping restaurant ada pool yang unik, kecil namun bagus, dengan pemandangan kota yang indah. Uniknya hotel ini memiliki wastafel yang berada bukan didalem kamar mandi didalam kamar tetapi diluar kamar mandi, plus dengan hair dryer dan kaca untuk bermakeup. Saya sangat puas menginap dihotel ini!

text: Semuanya sebenarnya hampir sempurna. Awalnya saya diberikan kamar Deluxe Single Bedroom sesuai request saya, namun ternyata kamar yg diberikan ini merupakan connecting room. Karena suara dari kamar sebelah jelas terdengar, maka saya meminta utk ganti kamar, dan Front Desk langsung membantu penggantian kamar dengan sigap, walaupun kemudian saya malah diberikan kamar Deluxe Double Bedroom. Akan tetapi mengingat ukuran tempat tidurnya tidak berbeda jauh dengan SIngle Bedroom, saya menerima.   Variasi menu breakfast cukup beragam. Wi-Fi juga bagus. Akan tetapi  check-out agak kacau balau. Setelah menyebutkan keinginan check-out serta nomor kamar, saya diminta menunggu karena staf Front Desk bernama Aida ini perlu menelpon housekeeping terlebih dahulu. Dan ini tentu prosedur normal di hotel manapun. Saya pun duduk menunggu. Tamu lain pun kemudian berdatangan ke Aida ini utk proses check-out juga, dan rupanya ybs terlalu sibuk dengan check-out tamu-tamu lain ini sehingga lupa bahwa dia telah meminta seorang tamu utk menunggu, yakni saya. Saya terus menunggu. Sempat beberapa kali saya bertanya kepadanya, dan ybs tetap memberi kode utk tetap menunggu. Saya pun sabar menunggu, sampai akhirnya 10 menit berlalu dan tamu lain yg check-out sudah tidak ada lagi, kembali saya bertanya. Aida langsung mengiyakan & mempersilakan saya pergi. Yg menjadi pertanyaan, kenapa ybs harus menunggu saya menanyakan? Padahal saya duduk sangat dekat dengan Front Desk. Andai saya tidak menanyakan, mungkin saya akan terus menunggu di situ, padahal yg saya tunggu tinggal kode OK darinya bahwa check-out saya sudah selesai sehingga saya bisa segera meninggalkan hotel. Hotel harus benar-benar menghargai waktu tamu. SOP check-out harus direview kembali oleh manajemen Golden Tulip Banjarmasin.
title: Check-Out yang Kacau

text:
Pilihan menginap di Golden Tulip ditetapkan setelah saya sebelumnya sempat booking di Swissbel Hotel dan Novotel, namun dengan pertmbangan bahwa Golden Tulip lebih baru, lebih bagus, dengan harga yang tidak jauh berbeda dibanding Swissbel dan Novotel (yang lokasi hotel jauh dari pusat kota), maka pilihan menginap ditetapkan di Golden Tulip..
Berikut Plus Minus berdasarkan pendapat saya :
Plus :
- Rate kamar yang masih tergolong murah mengingat pada saat bersamaan saya bersama dengan 2 orang teman lainnya, sehingga total kamar menjadi 3. Hotel juga bekerja sama dengan Bank Mega dengan memberikan disc sebesar 35%.
- Fasilitas lengkap dengan kolam renang di lantai 3 dan Dedari Spa untuk melepaskan penat.
- Pilihan makanan saat sarapan bervariasi. Favorit saya adalah Penne dengan susu kedelai serta wafel namun sayang wafel tidak dilengkapi dengan saus coklat sehingga saya harus meminta kepada waiter untuk menyediakannya.
- Kualitas amenities dan kualitas tempat tidur sangat bagus.
- Interior  modern dengan penerangan yang sangat bagus sehingga saya nyaman berada di kamar.
- Lokasi hotel tepat di seberang Duta Mall sehingga untuk menuju ke mall cukup menyebrang dan berjalan kaki saja dari hotel.
- Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari Djari-Djari (tempat pijat dan refleksi untuk menghilangkan penat).
- Lokasi hotel tidak jauh dari pusat oleh2 kain sasirangan Toko Citra Sasirangan.
- Lokasi kolam renang di lantai 3 menjadi tempat kongkow yang menyenangkan di sore hari.
 
Minus :
- Wastafel berada di dalam kamar, tidak berada di dalam kamar mandi sehingga terkadang menimbulkan percikan air di sekitar wastafel yang di sampingnya merupakan tempat menaruh koper dan lemari pakaian.Selain itu juga dapat mengenai saklar listrik yang berada di samping wastafel, cukup berisiko mengenai saklar listrik. Hal ini merupakan hal yang tidak biasa saya jumpai. 
- Kolam renang pada saat saya jumpai tidak terlalu bersih, air agak keruh. Mungkin manajemen hotel belum melakukan pengurasan air kolam renang pada saat saya berkunjung.
title: Menginap selama 8 hari di Golden Tulip, Banjarmasin

text:
Hotel baru yang letaknya berseberangan dengan mal terbesar di kota Banjarmasin. Jadi kalo mau belanja dan nyari makan gampang.
Dari segi pelayanan, ramah dan memuaskan. Sebelumnya, saya hanya booking via telepon. Dan pagi sebelum saya terbang ke Banjarmasin, pihak hotel menelpon saya kembali untuk memastikan kedatangan. Hal yang termasuk sedikit sekali dilakukan oleh hotel-hotel lain yang pernah saya booking via telepon tanpa perlu garansi kartu kredit ataupun pembayaran di muka.
Dari segi makanan, cukup bervariasi. Saya menginap 2 malam. Menu breakfast hari pertama dan kedua saya ada yang berbeda. Padahal saya bermaksud untuk mencoba  soto banjar pada keesokan harinya, karena di sarapan pertama saya lihat ada menu itu, tapi sayang, keesokan harinya soto banjar berganti dengan yang lain. Mmmm, belum beruntung...
Untuk kamar, cukup luas dan bersih. Hanya saja, AC di kamar yang saya tempati agak bermasalah. Kadang terlalu dingin, tp begitu suhunya dikurangi sedikit malah terasa panas, seperti anginnya saja yang keluar. Mungkiin itu saja yang perlu diperhatikan.
title: Hotel baru yang modern

Hotel ini berhadapan dengan Mal di Banjarmasin, sehingga kalau ingin berbelanja hanya tinggal menyebrang jalan saja.

untuk kamar hotel sangat nyaman, luas, penerangan sangat baik, apalagi jika untuk bekerja didalam kamar, lampu-lampu kamar sangat mendukung...

pelayanan baik, kekurangan berada pada pelayanan troli barang, menunggu sangat lama saat akan check out.. *semoga bisa dibenahi*

text: Hotel ini terletak di pusat Kota Banjarmasin. Waktu yang diperlukan dari bandar udara untuk menuju hotel ini adalah sekitar 60 hingga 90 menit. Hotel ini dikelilingi oleh banyak tempat yang menyediakan kebutuhan wisatawan selama berlibur, serta sangat cocok untuk kegiatan liburan. Tepat di depan hotel adalah satu pusat perbelanjaan yang terkenal di Banjarmasin. Ada akses untuk menyebrang jalan dari hotel menuju pusat perbelanjaan tersebut. Sebaiknya tamu selalu mengecek minibar dan tagihan biaya konsumsi (baik dalam kamar maupun restoran) dan menyimpan buktinya bila telah melakukan pembayaran karena dulu pernah mengalami salah paham. Kami menginap sekitar 6 hari dan harga kamar hanya termasuk makan pagi 1 orang. Berdasar kesepakatan dengan bagian penjualan yang kami hubungi, akan diberikan 3 kupon makan pagi (kami bertiga) untuk digunakan dan pembayaran akan memotong langsung dari uang simpanan pada hotel yang kami berikan pada awal kedatangan. Saat makan pagi hari terakhir, kami diminta menandatangani nota restoran sebanyak 6 hari tersebut untuk tambahan 2 orang (makan pagi). Kami bingung saat itu dan saat kepulangan ternyata hanya untuk verifikasi. Sungguh disayangkan menjadi pengalaman yang kurang baik.
title: HOTEL MEWAH DI JANTUNG KOTA BANJARMASIN

text: Saya datang ke Banjarmasin untuk tujuan pekerjaan dan menginap disalah satu hotel di tengah kota, nama hotel tersebut adalah Golden Tulip, hotel ini terbilang masih baru di Banjarmasin, yang menarik dari hotel ini lokasinya yang di tengah kota dan dekat dengan Mall Duta, dekat juga dengan kuliner-kuliner khas Banjarmasin, failitas di hotel ini cukup lengkap, lobby hotel luas, dan banyak sofa untuk sejenak beristirahat, dan baru kali ini saya menemukan hotel yang di lobbynya disediakan mesin pembersih sepatu, jadi jika sepatu anda berdebu bisa langsung menggunakan mesin tersebut, dan tidak perlu cape-cape menggosok sendiri, teknologi dari hotel ini juga rata-rata sudah digital, bisa dikatakan sudah canggih, dilihat dari penomoran kamar yang sudah digital, kolam renang yang menyatu dengan restoran, dan berada dilantai atas sehingga kita bisa melihat pemandangan sekitar, untuk free wifinya juga terbilang mudah hanya memasukkan nomor kamar kita aja, ruang meeting pun tersedia dan untuk anda yang perokok tidak perlu jauh-jauh turun ke bawah karena di dekat ruang meeting disediakan smooking room, jika kita mau ke Martapura dari hotel ini kira-kira bisa ditempuh dengan waktu kurang lebih 1,5 jam. secara keseluruhan menginap di Hotel Golden Tulip memberikan kesan yang menyenangkan dan nyaman seperti tinggal dirumah.

text:
Hotel ini masih baru.  Bangunan fisiknya baru, bukan cuma manajemen baru.  Lokasi hotel ini di pusat keramaian kota.  Menurut info dari resepsionis, hotel baru operasional selama sekitar 5-6 bulan,  Arsitektur dan interiornya terkesan modern.  Tergolong mewah untuk Kota Banjarmasin.  

Pelayannya ramah.  Kamarnya luas.  Tempat tidur OK.  Perlengkapan kamar mandi bagus, tapi klosetnya bau kurang sedap.  Kolam renangnya di lantai 3.  Menurut saya ukuran kolamnya terlalu kecil untuk hotel sekelas ini, tapi airnya bersih.  Pada saat saya menginap, harga kamarnya relatif murah.  Mungkin masih masa promosi.  Kalau harganya tetap seperti ini dan klosetnya tidak bau (persoalan sepele, tinggal semprot disinfektan), saya pasti menginap disini lagi jika ke Banjarmasin.  

Saya tidak sempat sarapan, karena harus check-out jam 5 pagi, tapi saya disiapkan kotak sarapan atas permintaan saya, berisi roti dan air mineral.  Jaringan WiFi nya lancar.
title: Di Tengah Kota

text:
Pengalaman menginap yang menyenangkan. Semua terasa fresh. Mungkin karena masih baru juga yah hotel ini, namun dengan fasilitas yang memadai serta nyaman, ditambah pelayanan yang ramah dan sopan, pengalaman menginap saya jadi cukup berkesan.

Room service juga cepat pelayanannya. Saat malam saya pesan soto banjar serta cappuccino, dan semua di kirimkan dengan tepat waktu. Makanan breakfast banyak pilihan dan enak-enak.

Kamar juga sangat nyaman, ditambah TV LED yang cukup besar dibandingkan hotel2 lain yg standar dengan ukuran 32 inch. Wastafel berada diluar kamar mandi dan saya anggap ini unik tanpa mengurangi kenyamanan kamar yang saya inapi. Teknologi kunci kamar serta lift juga baru dan cukup canggih.

Saya mengalami pengalaman unik disini. Saat saya check in, KTP saya dipinjam untuk dicopy oleh staf front desk, namun yang bersangkutan lupa untuk mengembalikan ke saya. Bukan hanya dia, saya juga lupa untuk memintanya. Semua berlanjut hingga check out, saya juga belum ngeh kalau KTP saya masih di front desk. Saya baru sadar ketika saya check in di bandara dan tidak menemukan KTP saya, langsung saya teringat posisi terakhir pasti masih ada di hotel. Akhirnya saya hubungi hotel dan mereka mengakui kesalahan mereka plus minta maaf, dan hari ini KTP saya sudah saya terima kembali (thanks untuk bantuan Pak Gaza).

Kolam renang di lantai 3 juga nyaman sekali kelihatannya (saya tidak bias berenang karena kolamnya sedang di kuras dan di servis).

Sukses terus untuk Golden Tulip. Jika saya harus kembali ke Banjarmasin, pasti saya akan kembali menginap disana.
title: Pelayanan yang satu langkah kedepan

text: I stayed there with my parents, and none of us are smoking. We book through traveloka, for a superior rooms, and already note for a non smoking room. They asked us, which type of bed I want, and I mention the twin, not the full size. And then when I go to the floor,, 5th or 7th if i am not mistaken, was a smoking floor. Then I back to the receptionist, asking them why gave me a smoking room. They said, mostly the superior room here are smoking, if you want the non smoking, please book the deluxe room. Are you Joking???? We have to pay extra bucks for non smoking room??? No way, this is the first time in my life after staying hundred time in different hotels where the front desk agent suggest me to pay extra for the non smoking room. Don't stay at this hotel if you are non smoking.
title: Not friendly for the Non-smoker

text:
This is not the first time i came to banjarmasin, but this is the first time i stay overnight in golden tulip galaxy banjarmasin, i'm trying to look something new, hmmm hotels crew service is almost nice, almost? Why? Cause the security officer too rigid, sorry i'm not joking about this, it makes guest felt something different, like what's wrong with me?if I had done something wrong? At frontdesk check-in room is fast, nice teamwork, and the frontdesk officer ask me to read terms and condition before i sign the agreement, a rare thing that I found at another hotel in this town 👍, nice but frontdesk officer still rigid, no smile, not showing cheerful, may need to be held in-service training 🙌
Move to room, room is non-smoking room according to my reservation, very nice, has a fragrant aroma, very clean and neat. Order food process is fast, and having good taste. When check out i'm confused to the frontdesk officer, he doesn't tell about my deposit, he only saying the rooms is ok, no problem and doesn't take anything from minibar, and we only open card. Then he said, you can go now. because I catch a morning flight, I did not think of it again, and immediately left the hotel. when in the airplane, I think about my deposits, how it goes? 🤔
sorry if I say too much

text:
Location around 25km from the airport, centrally located in the middle of the city. And you also can walk across the road to Duta Mall (connected to Mercure Hotel) for some snack shopping/movie/meals. 

When i arrived at 9pm, reception only 1, n it will be a problem if you arrive with a large group :).. but the staff manage to help me checked in quite efficient. The deluxe room was quite spacious. The toilet was quite minimalist, with a walk in closet + small bath area. The minor thing i found was two, its difficult to set the correct hot temperature for your bath.i tried my best to switch the knot, but seems it wasn't worked for me. :(.

plus a wash basin was located outside near the cupboard. its not common in hotels i've visited al this time >"<.. Toiletries were complete. Minibars also available near the basin (optional). Cable tv were ok.

The room was clean, the bed gave enough comfort, a bit hard for me though, lightning was sufficient to read/watch tv/work, WIFI is very fast (very recommended)/ Two large mirrors are available in the room. 

Will try the breakfast tomorrow.

But so far, for the budget, i think you can pick this hotel for your visit to Banjarmasin next time without have to worry for accessibility or entertainment around the site. :)
title: Strategically positioned & near the mall

text:
You can't find many great hotels in Banjarmasin. Mostly is budget hotels or even small hotels. When I want to have a good rest I always pick this hotel especially because of the location. There is Duta Mall (the one and only Mall in Banjarmasin) across the hotel. Just 1 minute by walking.

Anyway, my last visit was in the long weekend on March,26th-27th. It's quite crowded, maybe because it's a long weekend and they have special price. There was no problem when I checked in, but the problem happened when I checked out. A long queue waits for me. It's okay, I understand. But what I don't like when there were some men stood beside the reception table. What are they waiting for?

In the end, I knew why because I have to did it also. It's because we have to wait the information from the housekeeper whether we are using minibar or not and any basic stuffs. But I really don't get it. I never wait beside the reception table with unclear queue like this. And the staff keep doing the other checked out. After 15 minutes waiting without any information, I asked again about my checked out. The staff said I have to queue to be processed. She is the one who makes me wait (and some other guests) out from the queue without assurance and the other staff didn't do it on her queueu. So is it the procedure from the hotel or the incapablity of that staff? I tried to queue again and finally I checked out without any information from the housekeeper.
 
In the other hotel in Banjarmasin (even out of Banjarmasin), even it's crowded but they have a clear procedure. we check out until we finish it. Not wait beside the receptionist table and when we asked about our check out the staff asked us to queue if we want to be served. 

I hope I won't have that case again. Golden Tulip is a nice and comfortable hotel. But if the checked out service is like that, it's truly disappointing.
title: Nice Hotel but The Staff Must Learn More

text: There's this one exceptional receptionist with top notch service. She's Susan. She handled my reservation so nice and friendly. Your hotel must be so lucky to have her as one of your crew. I'm looking forward to get the best service from her. Can't wait to go back to your hotel 😄
title: Remarkable service from receptionist

text:
I really want to love this hotel. It's one of the nicest in Banjarmasin, the rooms are comfortable, the spa is great, the staff are friendly....unfortunately, they definitely need more training. First night, I was woken up by a phone call at 12:30am to tell me the room is a non-smoking room. I don't smoke & I was aware of that. Even if they were required to tell me that, couldn't they have told me in the afternoon when I checked in? Why 12:30am of all times?

The next day, again I was woken up at 4am in the morning. When I complained the next day, I was told that my colleague requested that everyone except 4 rooms were given a wake up call. My room was included in the 4 rooms. The staff member explaining the situation to me wasn't listening to me and kept telling me all except 4 rooms were to be given a wake up call. I kept trying to tell him my room number was one of the room numbers he listed as exempt from the wake up call. 

Eventually he apologized but that's it. I get the impression that the hotel just didn't care. 

I also came back to a dusty room on my 2nd day. The beds were made, but I guess the floors weren't swept. The trash wasn't cleared either. 

There's also a bright green light in the rooms that can't be turned off. I was told it was an emergency light. 

Definitely not the place to stay if you need sleep.
title: Sleeping is impossible

text:
I stayed in Golden Tulip for one night with my mom and brother when I visited Banjarmasin yesterday. The reason we chose this hotel at the first place was because it's strategically located in the center of the city just across the biggest Mall in town, a public hospital and gadget centers.
I booked the Superior room via Traveloka.
The check-in process was fast and easy, after I signed a form and handing in the deposit money (Rp.300,000), we were guided towards our room with the reception who generously asked to carry our baggages for multiple times even after we said no.
The room was so cozy and super clean, the interior was beautiful and it smelled good. They had this see-through bathroom with retractable curtain. Very useful for us since my little brother is still afraid to take a shower alone so he felt safe by opening the curtain.
They provided a hairdryer, bath-robes, electric kettle with several bags of tea, sugar and coffee, and a safe box. Sadly, we couldnt find any sandals which were really needed at that time.
Second thing is the hot shower wasn't hot at all, it was just slightly warm. I wonder if that is only in our room (720)..?
Breakfast was at Branche restaurant which is located alongside the pool. Nice view. We had to pay Rp.50,000 for my brother since the bfast package was only for two persons.
The foods were soooo delicious. Unlike most hotels which bfast menus are usually lack in spices, their menus were surprisingly rich in flavours and fresh. The menus were various from traditional, western, and chinese. So many options for appetizers, main courses, desserts, fruits and drinks that you'd wish you could eat them all at once.
The restaurant itself was so spacious, you can choose to eat inside, on the sofa, in front of the tv, besides the windows or outside near the pool.
The most memorable moment was when the hotel employee, Gt. Hasnur, cleaned our table after we finished eating and offered to take our pictures. Maybe he felt sorry for us who were busy taking groufies, hahaha. He was so friendly and kind, he had a small chat with us.
In conclusion, we had an amazing experience staying at Golden Tulip. We wished we didnt have to hurry back to our hometown so we could stay longer. Highly recommended.
title: Wonderful Experience

text:
Most reviews here will say that the hotel is great, well lit, spacious and has beautiful rooms. I agree. I am pretty happy with my stay at this hotel in the last business trip. My colleague says the same thing.

If I have to nit pick something, I'd say the water pressure with the shower can be made better to make it a truly 5-star experience. Hot water (or cold it is) pressure changes (as other people use water) making variations in temperature of your showering experience.

Another thing I can nit pick is the location. Late at night, I was looking for a bustling little town experience, with street food offering local delicacies near the hotel. Unfortunately, the streets were barren and the local street food scenery was pretty sad (at night), despite the provincial hospital located nearby (patient's family needed to eat and most would go to these food stalls, in other cities anyway). There was a huge mall almost across the street, but for those who travel off the beaten path, this wouldn't add any excitement.

Front desk is pretty small, staffed by a maximum of 4 people. I didn't experience delay, but wonder if there is a surge or group of people registering (checking in and out).

Overall, the stay at the hotel itself has been great and I will recommend this hotel to others.
title: Great hotel, with some caveats.

text:
Overall, this hotel is just average. Beside it's in the middle of the city that makes easier for you to get around, and it is quite new hotel; nothing else that this hotel could offer compare to other hotels. Oh.. this hotel has see through glass in the bath room so it is good for honeymoon couple :)

But breakfast is not as expected.  One morning, I was the first person went to the restaurant for breakfast since I needed to go early in the morning.  I was stunned when I found my rice is undercooked and not eatable.  I asked the waiter to see the restaurant manager but he's was not available yet and I met the manager on duty instead.  I reported to him what I had and he put some notes.  After that I saw the restaurant staff change the rice plate with the new one.  Good thing for the hotel only one guess ate that uncooked rice!

The other flaw is the swimming pool. The water is not crystal clear and it has some kind of filament on the surface.  When I asked the hotel staff he said that it was because of the quality of the water from Water company.  OK... but I think for 4-star hotel, they should have the water filtering and purifying system, don't they?
title: Breakfast is not as expected

text:
This is a new hotel in Banjarmasin, located in front of shopping mall that is easy to just hanging around. But beware of vehicles when you're crossing the street, especially motorcycles, 'cos some might not understand the function of brake. 

Spacious bedroom and location, may be the most important factor they have. Dinner or breakfast content and service just so so that I was not impressed. The dining room lay-out was just rather confusing for me. I think they should re-work on this.

Actually I (and a business friend) had bad experience when we were there for the first time. Had wrong type of bedroom, the hotel was full booked and it was late at night. Fortunately the desk staff and his manager handled us professionally, that we can stay that night with upgraded room. They even provided us hot tea when waited, and supply us with free fresh fruit as apology. Excluding the 'present of apology', I can say I was impressed how the staffs, Dani (desk) and Heru (manager) treat and handled us. Good work!!

text:
Banjarmasin is developing city. A few years ago, if you go to Banjarmasin, will be quite difficult for you to find a good hotel, but now there are couple of new hotels in Banjarmasin, and one of it is Golden Tulip. 
Located at the very central location, close to everywhere and very easy to access. Just a few steps from the biggest Banjarmasin's shopping mall. 
The hotel itself is a new built hotel, modern style, huge lobby area, rooms are good, modern and quite spacious with comfy bed and pillows. The negative point is the room has no soundproof, it was too noisy. 
Staffs are friendly, however still need to be trained to be more professional. Quick check-in process, but a bit slow when check-out.
I didn't have breakfast here, so I can't give comment on the breakfast options.
For sure, this hotel is the right choice when you travel to Banjarmasin currently.
title: Good Hotel at the Very Central Location

text:
This is one of the great new modern hotel in town. It is located at the city center and in front of big shopping mall in Banjarmasin. I like the lighting concept at the receptionist desk, the chandeliers form the shape of the planet. The hall is really huge and it is comfort to sit and wait (if you have to) or just spend your time at the sofa. 

The room is big enough for standard size, but the bathroom is quite small, even the washstand is outside the bathroom. Other than that, it's clean and the bed is comfort for your sleep and rest your body.

The service is need to be improved, yes the staffs are friendly but they don't have initiative to help, even at the dining room in the morning for breakfast, there is no staff in front of the restaurant to welcome us just like the other 4-5 stars hotel. They don't have many selection of dishes and the taste is also so so. Not big fans for its dining room. 

The pool is quite nice and have a good view even I don't have time to swim there, just passing through. 
Overall, it is a great hotel with modern concept, and definitely will come back here next time.
title: Great Modern Hotel at The City Center

Another plus was the restaurants that they have in level 2 and 3 was fantastic, they even serve good meals in their so called Branche restaurant. The Duck King was definitely a plus! Great taste of authentic chinese food! 
I heard during this Ramadhan season they are opening till 3AM.. 

overall i was enjoying my stay and will definitely be back and stay in this hotel next time!

Cheers

text:
Stayed here one night on business trip, I've always been curious on staying idea here, and finally i did. 

The room is quite big, as well as the bathroom. Amenities are beyond perfect. I hot Deluxe room type but there are bathrobes, hairdryer, and extra pillows. Wastafel is located outside the bathroom, which is quite good. 

Another plus point is the location, it's just across the shopping mall, and if you're not too into ordering room service, you can just walk to the mall and get your tummy some foods. As for me, i always give it a shot when i stay on hotel, so i did it here too. Room service menus are various and the price is reasonable. 

Breakfast is served on 6.00 - 10.00 am, located on third floor, at Branche restaurant. You can have breakfast while enjoying the cityview thru almost 360゜glass window.

One thing i haven't tried is the pool and fitness center, because i got to the hotel when it's already bedtime and leave again at tomorrow's morning for work. Would stay here again for leisure purpose.
title: As expected

Okay service, nice food (we ordered porridge, duck, veggie, dimsum, and other dishes). But the selection here isn't as much as the Duck King in Jakarta/surabaya. As many new trainees, clearly check your order and repeat it to them, otherwise they'll forget something.
My Parents also spent a night staying here, they love it but said the service is sloooow.. 
 
The hotel bistro is nice too but the service is exteremely slooooow! The portion doesn't match the price and the slow service. It's'a new hotel chain and new employees, new trainees, so expect the unexpected! We spent 2 hours on my Brother's'b'day waiting for the food at the bistro.

text: Wir wollten die schwimmenden Märkte besuchen und haben deshalb einen eintägigen Zwischenstopp in Banjarmasin eingelegt. Das Hotel ist sehr sauber und die Angestellten sind hilfbereit. Die Zimmer haben allerdings schon kleiner Macken. Als wir die Tour zu den schwimmenden Märkten organisieren wollten, hat die Rezeption den Kontakt hergestellt. Der zunächst verlangte Preis war aber viel zu hoch. Glücklicherweise wussten wir wie weit bzw. nah die Strecke war und konnten Handeln. Der Führer war etwas eigenartig, so dass wir mit der Tour zwar zufrieden waren, aber dennoch das Gefühl hatten, man versuche möglichst viel Geld daraus zu schöpfen, da wir im Golden Tulip abgestiegen waren.
